TopicTitle: The new VAB and Space Plane Hangar

Articles.Content: This looks amazing!
there's a new part? isn't that the core probe with six sides from KSPX?
That is gonna kill my framerate, out right murder it.
Max mentioned that the poly count of the building models was reduced to 1/3rd what it used to be so it should actually increase performance.

Max mentioned that the poly count of the building models was reduced to 1/3rd what it used to be so it should actually increase performance.

The Kerbals won't be there anyway, they kill my framerate too :c. But that's awesome that it's now 1/3rd, I could also unfire all of my Kerbals hopefully.
But of course max. You guys put alot of effort into this game and most who play it are probably just happy they can.
I won't been missing the old buildings, that's for sure .
wow. awesome!
Epic, just epic!
I love it, absolutely love it. In these past few updates, Ive noticed a more-serious-yet-still-fun theme in KSP as a whole, and I appreciate the change.

Ooooh pretty! And, and less polys used?! How?!? Witchcraft! Good looking shiny witchcraft!

For which I heartily approve
To those who liked the old building: This IS the same building, it's just what it always looked like. You were looking at it through a SD monitor, but it's now an HD.
Then I can't wait to see the 1440p version if this is HD.

To those who liked the old building: This IS the same building, it's just what it always looked like. You were looking at it through a SD monitor, but it's now an HD.

And here I thought my monitor was HD this whole time.
I see a Kerbal icon. Maybe we'll get to pick how many Kerbals we have on the mission?

I see a Kerbal icon. Maybe we'll get to pick how many Kerbals we have on the mission?

That's like... One of the biggest additions in 0.21

Didn't you read the KSP Weekly articles?

That's like... One of the biggest additions in 0.21

Didn't you read the KSP Weekly articles?

Okay, okay, I'll read them. Geez.
The new buildings look awesome. So much attention to detail!

Okay, okay, I'll read them. Geez.

Sorry if I sounded rude.

I'm just excited about everything we're getting in 0.21!
I thought it was fake for a few minutes because it's just too good to be true

We're glad you like them!

Really do. Hope Nova is not too sad from knowing the polys were overkill. Low poly modelling is a real skill that takes time to learn. Plus PCs/optimizations .
Still hard to believe that those take less to run than the old models.

i had to get my chin off the floor and i could cry

OMG thats all i can say
Flipping amazing!
Actually mth lighting seems off. It should have more shadows IMO
